text:
[identifier] and consists of a singleton placenta with umbilical cord and attached membranes.

Umbilical Cord:
   Length:  [length]
   Insertion:  [insertion]
   Vessels:  [number]
   Knots:  [description]
   Coiling:  [description]

Extraplacental Membranes:
   Insertion:  [insertion]
   Color:  [color]
   Amnion Nodosum:  [description]
   Cysts:  [description]
   Point of Rupture:  [description]

Placental Disc:
   Weight:  [weight] grams.
   Shape:  [shape]
   Measurements:  [measurement]
   Fetal Surface:
      Fetal Surface:  [description]
      Amnion Nodosum:  [description]
      Cysts:  [description]
   Maternal Surface:
      Hemorrhage:  
         Adherent:  [measurement], [description]
         Non-Adherent:  [measurement]
      Maternal Surface:  [description]
      Surface Infarcts:  [description]
   Sectioned at 1 cm intervals:
       Infarcts:  [description]
       Cysts:  [description]

Cassette Summary: 
"1A" - Cord from both ends, 
"1B" - Membranes, 
"1C" - "1D" - Central placenta/infarcts.
